sentences.en: All deck fittings, windows, hatches and doors had been fastened.
sentences.cn: 甲板上所有的装置、窗户、舱口盖和门都已经关牢了。

sentences.en: deck furniture
sentences.cn: 木制平台上用的家具

sentences.en: Eddie returned to the flight deck (= the part of an aircraft where the pilot sits ) .
sentences.cn: 埃迪回到了驾驶舱。

sentences.en: He lifted him clear of the deck with one arm.
sentences.cn: 他用一只手就将他从甲板上拎了起来。

sentences.en: I jumped the last six feet down to the deck.
sentences.cn: 最后的6英尺我一跃而下，跳到甲板上。

sentences.en: I stood up and almost fell, reeling against the deck rail.
sentences.cn: 我站了起来，几乎跌倒，身体摇晃着靠在甲板的围栏上。

sentences.en: I stuck a tape in the deck.
sentences.cn: 我把一盘磁带放进带仓里。

sentences.en: I was the only person on deck at that time of night.
sentences.cn: 夜里那段时间只有我一个人在甲板上。

sentences.en: I wonder if you could find me a deck of cards?
sentences.cn: 不知您能否为我找一副纸牌？

sentences.en: Let’s go up on deck .
sentences.cn: 我们到甲板上去吧。

sentences.en: Lots of pubs like to deck themselves out with flowers in summer.
sentences.cn: 夏日里有许多酒吧喜欢用鲜花来装饰店面。

sentences.en: Mckinnon went down from deck to the officers' quarters.
sentences.cn: 麦金农走下甲板，来到军官们的住处。

sentences.en: On the ship's deck, after the whoops and hollers, the butchering begins.
sentences.cn: 在甲板上,一阵欢呼喧嚷过后,屠宰开始了.

sentences.en: She took a deck of cards and began to lay them out.
sentences.cn: 她拿了一副扑克，开始摆牌。

sentences.en: Steamers tooted at us as sailors on deck waved in amusement.
sentences.cn: 汽船向我们嘟嘟鸣笛时，甲板上的水手们饶有趣味地挥着手。

sentences.en: Students travel the cheap lower deck and tourists the upper.
sentences.cn: 学生坐廉价的下层舱，游客坐上层舱。

sentences.en: The cables tightened and he was lifted gradually from the deck.
sentences.cn: 缆绳绷紧了，他被慢慢地吊离了甲板。

sentences.en: This boat has a good deck layout making everything easy to operate.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的甲板布局合理，使得所有操控都很方便。

sentences.en: Two men were on the bridge-deck, steadying a ladder.
sentences.cn: 两名男子在船桥甲板上扶着一架梯子不让它摇晃。

sentences.en: We sat on the top deck of the bus.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在公共汽车的上层。

phrases.tran_cn: 折叠式躺椅；折叠帆布躺椅
舱面建筑；甲板结构；上承结构；舱面结构

phrases.phrase: not playing with a full deck
phrases.tran_cn: (北美， 非正式)智力上有缺陷的
&I{【体育运动】} 准备下一个上场：击球员准备下一个上场的，尤指在棒球运动中
n. 录放音座（等于deck）；磁带放送机（等于tape player）
甲板；上甲板；坞墙顶甲板

trans.tran_cn: 甲板，层，带仓，木制平台，一副（纸牌）
trans.tran_en: one of the levels on a bus, plane etc
to decorate something with flowers, flags etc
